84_121550_000194_000000.original_text: When I was near unto the blessed shore, "Asperges me," I heard so sweetly sung, Remember it I cannot, much less write it.
84_121550_000194_000000.normalized_text: When I was near unto the blessed shore, "Asperges me," I heard so sweetly sung, Remember it I cannot, much less write it.

84_121550_000114_000000.original_text: Motionless halted, the veracious people, That came at first between it and the Griffin, Turned themselves to the car, as to their peace.
84_121550_000114_000000.normalized_text: Motionless halted, the veracious people, That came at first between it and the Griffin, Turned themselves to the car, as to their peace.

84_121550_000115_000000.original_text: And one of them, as if by Heaven commissioned, Singing, "Veni, sponsa, de Libano" Shouted three times, and all the others after.
84_121550_000115_000000.normalized_text: And one of them, as if by Heaven commissioned, Singing, "Veni, sponsa, de Libano" Shouted three times, and all the others after.

84_121123_000021_000000.original_text: "Oh, you rave, sir," exclaimed Villefort, in vain endeavoring to escape the net in which he was taken.
84_121123_000021_000000.normalized_text: "Oh, you rave, sir," exclaimed Villefort, in vain endeavoring to escape the net in which he was taken.

84_121550_000036_000000.original_text: "The water," said I, "and the forest's sound, Are combating within me my new faith In something which I heard opposed to this."
84_121550_000036_000000.normalized_text: "The water," said I, "and the forest's sound, Are combating within me my new faith In something which I heard opposed to this."

84_121550_000294_000000.original_text: But wherefore so beyond my power of sight Soars your desirable discourse, that aye The more I strive, so much the more I lose it?"
84_121550_000294_000000.normalized_text: But wherefore so beyond my power of sight Soars your desirable discourse, that aye The more I strive, so much the more I lose it?"

84_121550_000056_000000.original_text: Then backward did I turn me wholly round Unto my Poets, and saw that with a smile They had been listening to these closing words;
84_121550_000056_000000.normalized_text: Then backward did I turn me wholly round Unto my Poets, and saw that with a smile They had been listening to these closing words;

84_121550_000276_000000.original_text: It me befell, that without perfect sound Began I: "My necessity, Madonna, You know, and that which thereunto is good."
84_121550_000276_000000.normalized_text: It me befell, that without perfect sound Began I: "My necessity, Madonna, You know, and that which thereunto is good."

84_121123_000020_000002.original_text: "And I say that murders are committed here," said Morrel, whose voice, though lower in tone, lost none of its terrible distinctness: "I tell you that this is the fourth victim within the last four months.
84_121123_000020_000002.normalized_text: "And I say that murders are committed here," said Morrel, whose voice, though lower in tone, lost none of its terrible distinctness: "I tell you that this is the fourth victim within the last four months.

84_121550_000089_000000.original_text: Even as in heaven star followeth after star, There came close after them four animals, Incoronate each one with verdant leaf.
84_121550_000089_000000.normalized_text: Even as in heaven star followeth after star, There came close after them four animals, Incoronate each one with verdant leaf.

84_121550_000293_000000.original_text: And I: "As by a signet is the wax Which does not change the figure stamped upon it, My brain is now imprinted by yourself.
84_121550_000293_000000.normalized_text: And I: "As by a signet is the wax Which does not change the figure stamped upon it, My brain is now imprinted by yourself.

84_121550_000281_000000.original_text: Within which a Five-hundred, Ten, and Five, One sent from God, shall slay the thievish woman And that same giant who is sinning with her.
84_121550_000281_000000.normalized_text: Within which a Five hundred, Ten, and Five, One sent from God, shall slay the thievish woman And that same giant who is sinning with her.

84_121550_000177_000000.original_text: Cast down the seed of weeping and attend; So shalt thou hear, how in an opposite way My buried flesh should have directed thee.
84_121550_000177_000000.normalized_text: Cast down the seed of weeping and attend; So shalt thou hear, how in an opposite way My buried flesh should have directed thee.

84_121550_000196_000000.original_text: Then forth she drew me, and all dripping brought Into the dance of the four beautiful, And each one with her arm did cover me.
84_121550_000196_000000.normalized_text: Then forth she drew me, and all dripping brought Into the dance of the four beautiful, And each one with her arm did cover me.

84_121123_000008_000004.original_text: "Go!--do you hear?" said Villefort, while d'Avrigny advanced to lead Morrel out.
84_121123_000008_000004.normalized_text: "Go!--do you hear?" said Villefort, while d'Avrigny advanced to lead Morrel out.

84_121550_000078_000000.original_text: Then back I turned my face to those high things, Which moved themselves towards us so sedately, They had been distanced by new-wedded brides.
84_121550_000078_000000.normalized_text: Then back I turned my face to those high things, Which moved themselves towards us so sedately, They had been distanced by new wedded brides.

84_121550_000286_000000.original_text: Whoever pillages or shatters it, With blasphemy of deed offendeth God, Who made it holy for his use alone.
84_121550_000286_000000.normalized_text: Whoever pillages or shatters it, With blasphemy of deed offendeth God, Who made it holy for his use alone.

84_121550_000147_000000.original_text: Therefore my answer is with greater care, That he may hear me who is weeping yonder, So that the sin and dole be of one measure.
84_121550_000147_000000.normalized_text: Therefore my answer is with greater care, That he may hear me who is weeping yonder, So that the sin and dole be of one measure.

84_121550_000091_000000.original_text: Reader! to trace their forms no more I waste My rhymes; for other spendings press me so, That I in this cannot be prodigal.
84_121550_000091_000000.normalized_text: Reader! to trace their forms no more I waste My rhymes; for other spendings press me so, That I in this cannot be prodigal.

84_121123_000062_000003.original_text: For some temperaments work is a remedy for all afflictions.
84_121123_000062_000003.normalized_text: For some temperaments work is a remedy for all afflictions.
